entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: CatLight Pro: Selfie Light Cam
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

CatLight Pro: The Ultimate Selfie Lighting Studio Elevate your selfie game with professional lighting effects! CatLight Pro transforms your phone into a professional lighting studio, giving you perfect lighting for any selfie moment. Key Features: ‚Ä¢ 8 professionally calibrated lighting presets ‚Ä¢ 360¬∞ color wheel for complete customization ‚Ä¢ Precise brightness control system ‚Ä¢ Smart screen brightness adjustment ‚Ä¢ Convenient camera preview ‚Ä¢ Volume button capture support ‚Ä¢ Clean, intuitive interface Advanced Selfie Tools: ‚Ä¢ Selfie mirroring to find your best angle ‚Ä¢ Live Photo capture for dynamic moments ‚Ä¢ Timer mode for perfectly posed shots ‚Ä¢ Video recording with screenshot capability ‚Ä¢ Front/back camera switching Why Choose CatLight Pro: Professional lighting effects for studio-quality selfies Complete customization with adjustable hue and brightness Intuitive controls - swipe to change effects, use volume buttons to capture Real-time preview to see lighting effects instantly Elegant, user-friendly design Perfect For: ‚Ä¢ Social media content creation ‚Ä¢ Livestreaming ‚Ä¢ Makeup application ‚Ä¢ Professional portraits ‚Ä¢ Low-light photography Whether you're a content creator, makeup enthusiast, or just want to take better selfies, CatLight Pro delivers professional lighting effects with just a tap!

entry.title: Incredibox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions. Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world. How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune. Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff? You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again! Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you! Pump it up and chill ;) **************** Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Photomator ‚Äì Photo Editor
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $29.99 [$7.99 ~ $39.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö$29.99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö$7.99
  • Exclusive Lifetime OfferÔºö$79.99
  • LifetimeÔºö$119.99

Application Description

Photomator is the most powerful photo editing app ever designed for a mobile device. It includes an extensive collection of cutting-edge color adjustments, automatic selections powered by AI, support for over 750 RAW image formats, a magical Repair tool for removing unwanted objects, and many more powerful features, letting you enjoy pro photo editing anyplace, anytime. Everything you need to make your photos look incredible ‚Ä¢ Edit photos using a wide collection of powerful, nondestructive color adjustments ‚Ä¢ Quickly make precise subject, sky, and background selections in photos using AI, add gradient masks, and easily make selections using a brush ‚Ä¢ Effortlessly remove unwanted objects using an incredible object removal tool ‚Ä¢ Crop, straighten, rotate, and adjust the perspective of photos with an easy-to-use Crop tool ‚Ä¢ Instantly increase the resolution of photos using AI ‚Ä¢ Remove camera noise and image compression artifacts with the powerful Denoise feature ‚Ä¢ Magically remove color banding and increase color depth in photos with the AI-powered Smart Deband feature ‚Ä¢ Make your photos stand out with photographer-designed presets for landscape, black and white, and other photography styles ‚Ä¢ Easily copy and paste edits between photos or batch edit even hundreds of photographs at a time ‚Ä¢ Open and edit over 750 RAW image formats, including Apple ProRAW and compressed Fujifilm RAWs ‚Ä¢ Follow all the changes you make in the beautiful live histogram Tools powered by AI ‚Ä¢ Select the subject, sky, or background in a photo with just a tap ‚Ä¢ Improve the quality of photos by reducing camera noise with the AI-powered Denoise feature, intelligently upscale photos with Super Resolution, or magically remove color banding and increase color depth using Smart Deband ‚Ä¢ Automatically enhance shots using a machine learning algorithm trained on 20 million pro photos, or fine-tune individual adjustments, like White Balance, Selective Color, or Color Balance with a single tap ‚Ä¢ Intelligently crop photos using the AI-powered auto-cropping ‚Ä¢ Copy the look of any photo to another using the incredible Match Colors feature State-of-the-art color adjustments ‚Ä¢ Enjoy powerful tools for effortlessly adjusting the temperature, tint, exposure, contrast, brightness, hue, saturation, and vibrance in your photos ‚Ä¢ Recover incredible amounts of detail in the highlights and shadows of photos ‚Ä¢ Magically enhance fine details and structure in photos using powerful Clarity and Texture adjustments, or adjust textures in the highlights, midtones, and shadows separately ‚Ä¢ Selectively edit individual color ranges with Selective Color, or improve the balance of colors in the shadows, midtones, and highlights with Color Balance ‚Ä¢ Adjust lighting and colors with full precision using Levels and Curves adjustments ‚Ä¢ Mix the balance of the red, green, and blue color channels to create intense color effects in your images ‚Ä¢ Replace any color with any other using the Replace Color adjustment ‚Ä¢ Create beautiful black and whites even from your color photos ‚Ä¢ Use a range of additional adjustments, like Sharpen, Fade, Grain, Color Monochrome, Sepia, and Invert to make your photos stand out ‚Ä¢ Instantly change the look of photos with LUTs or export custom LUTs to use in other apps Compatibility ‚Ä¢ Automatically sync every change back to your Photos or Files browser ‚Ä¢ With the support for iCloud Drive, enjoy seamless edit syncing across Mac, iPhone, and iPad ‚Ä¢ Photomator is built from the ground up for iPhone and iPad with a native design that blends seamlessly with the sleek and modern look of iOS and iPadOS 18 ‚Ä¢ Photomator uses powerful Apple technologies like Metal, Core ML, and Core Image to deliver staggeringly fast performance, even when editing large RAW photos or batch editing multiple images at a time ‚Ä¢ Privacy policy: https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Train Dispatcher!2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí $0.29 [$0.29 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

Application Description

Drive trains and carry passengers on Japanese railway lines. „ÉªSimple brain game "Train Dispatcher!2" is a brain game with simple rules. No expertise required. Train fans, game fans, everyone can enjoy it. „ÉªTo everyone who will become a train dispatcher In the morning in Japan, customers are waiting for the arrival of the train to go to work. Let's start the train and transport the customers. „ÉªGoal of the game Japanese railway companies are for-profit organizations. Let's aim for high operating profit! „ÉªHow to make profit Fare revenue - Departure cost = Operating profit. Fare revenue is generated when passengers board at a station. Example) If two passengers board a train at a station with a fare of 20, the company receives 40. Departure costs are charged according to the number of cars when the train departs. Example) 30 for a 2-car train, 40 for a 4-car train, and 70 for a 10-car train. One person can ride in one car. Fare revenue is generated when customers board the train. Adjust the driving schedule and the number of vehicles to aim for the highest profit. Departure costs. If you run too many trains and the occupancy rate drops, you'll lose revenue. „ÉªHow to operate The game is very easy to operate and the rules are simple. All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time. As the game progresses, various variations such as express trains and transfer stations will appear. „ÉªVolume Enjoy over 50 routes. Please experience the wide variety of transportation strategies of Japanese railway companies. No ads, no charges. „ÉªNo ads, no billing Please concentrate on the game. Children can also enjoy the game. Share your results on Social Media. „ÉªTrain lines you can play with JR East Japan JR Tokai JR West Japan JR Kyushu Tobu Tokyu Seibu Keio Keikyu Keihan Hankyu Hanshin Kintetsu Meitetsu Odakyu Nankai Seitetsu Sotetsu Keisei Tokyo Metro Osaka Metro Toei Subway Tsukuba Express „ÉªCapacity is about 130MB The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Chord
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.29 [$0.29 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

Application Description

This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music! A comprehensive set of tools for any musician: * Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer! * MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer). * Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs. * Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions. * Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear. * Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training. Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Island Story: 100 Days
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [Free ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

You are shipwrecked on a desert island. ‚ñ† Easy-to-Play ‚Ä¢ Tap to move and gather. ‚ñ† Survival ‚Ä¢ Eating only wild fruits will not fill your stomach. ‚Ä¢ Catch fish through a mini-game, or craft traps to obtain meat. ‚ñ† In-Depth Health System ‚Ä¢ Staying healthy is a constant challenge. ‚Ä¢ Manage a complex simulation including: Weight, Wounds, Hunger, Thirst, Energy, Body Temperature, Insect Bites‚Ä¶ ‚ñ† Upgrade Your Camp ‚Ä¢ Gather resources to craft tools and build new furniture. ‚ñ† Dynamic Weather ‚Ä¢ Different weather can limit your movements and may disrupt your plans for the day. ‚ñ† Self-Sufficient ‚Ä¢ Discover how to grow crops and raise goats. Make your own bread from scratch. ‚ñ† Relaxation ‚Ä¢ Natural white noise. --------- Offline Play ¬∑ Ad-Free

entry.title: Seoul Exorcist 1111: Roguelite
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $5.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • 200,000 x CoinsÔºö$9.99
  • 80,000 x CoinsÔºö$4.99
  • 40,000 x CoinsÔºö$2.99
  • 10,000 x CoinsÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Think Fast, Strike Faster! As the ultimate exorcist, choose your attacks wisely, upgrade combat deck, combine traits and items, and save the cursed souls‚Äîbefore death finds you. ‚ñ™ Real-Time Turn-Based Combat Enemies react the moment you make a decision‚Äî! Fast, tense action with every move. ‚ñ™ 4 Characters with Unique Strategies Each with 8 uniques attack types, exclusive animations, and 2 passive traits. Adapt your playstyle for every run. ‚ñ™ Time Limit - Think Fast, Strike Faster! You have just 7 minutes to defeat all enemies in each run. You've been relentlessly trained for this moment. ‚ñ™ Item & Trait Combinations Strategic synergies that activate automatically during battle. Timing and adaptability are the keys to victory! ‚ñ™ Roguelite Clear all 7 maps and the boss in a single run‚Äîor get reset! But clearing the same map 3 times unlocks progress. Collect coins, build a stronger deck, and dive back in! ‚ñ™ 12 Languages Supported ‚Ä®Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Russian. ‚ñ™ Offline Game All data is stored locally. No network required. Be Aware. Uninstalling the app will erase saved data. ‚ñ™Discord https://discord.gg/UaZApdWG93 ‚ñ™For inquires / bug report snowgames0629@gmail.com

entry.title: 7Days : Backer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.49 [$0.49 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.49

Application Description

Are you bored of the same old novels? Are you interested in interactive story games, visual novel, choice based storyline, and indie games, but you're tired of the same old? Try our Adventure Game, a Mysterious Novel where choices do matter! We are offering our interactive storytelling game named ‚Äò7Days: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game‚Äô. All our stories, mysterious novels are written by diligently selected authors. Here we come a story game, filled with mystery, touching, innocent episodes, storyline and chat stories! '7Days!: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game' is an amazing mystery story game and choice based game. It is a unique choice based, storytelling game where the user can create their unique story based on the choices they make. We will provide the best story game experience with a great mystery storyline via the chat based adventure game, designed to suit mobile devices. It is a strongly recommended game for you. ‚ñ† Game explained Every choice you make will change your story. Every small choice will change your relationships with comrades, and change your fate and those of your comrades at critical moments. You may be the villain, or a trustworthy comrade. Everything depends on your choices. ‚ñ† Mystery Storyline There are dead spirits who have been put to test for resurrection in the world of death. The messenger of death has assigned them each with a task and they must either attack one another or work together. Your character, Kirell, must also complete the choice-based tasks that she has been assigned. But her tasks requires others to die.... You only have 7 days What choice will you make? Experience this imagination-provoking story right now. ‚ñ† '7Days: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game' features - Graphic Novel style artwork with stunning graphics - Unique game setting that switches between life and death - Mystery storyline that changes according to your choices - Various achievements and hidden challenges - Different episodes and endings based on the story - Text adventure with a mysterious feeling - Exciting storytelling game - Choice based game in mystery ‚ñ† We recommend this Adventure Game, Story Game for‚Ä¶ - Who Like Visual Novel, Mystery Games, Adventure Game or Story Games, Opus, Innocent - Want to kill time while playing Adventure Games or reading a Visual Novel - Love to be in World of Ghosts, or like to play Mystery Games, Interactive Storyline - Love light novels, Masterpiece Storyline, Mysterious Novel or Adventure Games - Those who want to move from the old stories & old templates of adventure game - Love interactive mystery story, Masterpiece Novel, Storytelling game - Those who get tired of playing regular novel story - Who Like Adventure Games | Best Storytelling | Mystery Storyline | Thriller Storyline | Innocent Storyline | Indie Games ‚ñ† We guarantee that it'll be fun. Download and experience it right now We bring new adventure game storyline! Now, you have the opportunity to enjoy our Thriller, Mystery Story Adventure Games! If you see any issues or have good suggestions, please send them to help@buffstudio.com. We will work hard make better Choice based story games, Mystery storytelling, Indie games, Thriller storyline, Adventure games, Choice based game. ‚ñ† We need your support to make better story games, adventure games, visual novel games. Please recommend this storytelling game to your family and friends. It will be of great help to us.

entry.title: Coffee Inc 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Real Estate ExpansionÔºö$1.99
  • Venture ExpansionÔºö$1.99
  • Sports ExpansionÔºö$1.99
  • Custom InteriorÔºö$0.99
  • Auction ExpansionÔºö$1.99
  • Private JetÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Coffee Inc 2 - Build Your Global Coffee Empire Coffee Inc 2 is the next generation of the hit business simulation game. Start as the founder of a small cafe and grow into a world-class coffee empire. From brewing your first blend to managing thousands of employees, every decision is in your hands. Hire and inspire great talent, develop new products, run marketing campaigns, manage your finances, and expand into major cities around the world. Compete with rival shops, dominate new markets, and prove yourself as the ultimate coffee entrepreneur. What‚Äôs New in Coffee Inc 2 ‚Ä¢ Expand into real-world cities: San Francisco, Chicago, New York, Tokyo, Osaka, London, Paris, Berlin, Amsterdam, Rome, Madrid, Sydney, and Seattle. ‚Ä¢ Play globally with multiple currencies: USD, EUR, JPY, and GBP. ‚Ä¢ Customize store interiors, exteriors, and equipment - or design your own layouts. ‚Ä¢ Set menus and pricing, and create brand-new coffee products. ‚Ä¢ Run smarter marketing campaigns, from local promotions to city-wide brand awareness drives. ‚Ä¢ Hire staff, keep them happy, and delegate daily operations to store managers. ‚Ä¢ Handle unexpected incidents from both employees and customers. ‚Ä¢ Build offices and create departments in HR, Finance, Marketing, Products, Engineering, Executive, and Investment. ‚Ä¢ Track detailed financials with income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow reports. ‚Ä¢ Develop online services and apps to expand beyond the cafe walls. ‚Ä¢ Hire C-level executives like COO, CFO, CTO, and CMO - and reward them with stock options. ‚Ä¢ Hold board meetings, set executive compensation, and decide on dividends. ‚Ä¢ Work with investment banks to pursue IPOs and acquisitions. ‚Ä¢ Enter the plantation business: grow your own coffee beans, manage harvests, and control quality from farm to cup. ‚Ä¢ Diversify into real estate and stock markets through your investment division. ‚Ä¢ Keep personal wealth separate from company wealth. ‚Ä¢ Save and sync your progress across devices with iCloud. ‚Ä¢ Always ad-free.

entry.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$44.99 ‚Üí $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $44.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$8.99

Application Description

Having won over 160 awards and nominations including a BAFTA, Divinity: Original Sin 2 finally comes to Mac. Form a party and experience true branching gameplay with a story unique to each player, in a world filled with evil and abandoned by the gods. Your choices matter, so choose wisely, and know that only one of you can become the new Divine! Warning: before purchasing, please verify if your machine meets the requirements listed below. Features: - Play as one of 5 fantasy races, each with their own personalities and stories: Elves, Dwarves, Lizards, Humans, and the Undead. - Explore a vast world full of loot, treasures, upgrades, and stories with unprecedented branching narratives. - Turn-based combat featuring the elements of nature: combine fire, earth, water, air and everything in between to take down your enemies. - Talk to animals and ghosts to gain unique insights about the world and its secrets. - Up to 4 players online or 2 player split-screen coop. - Hold CMD when launching the game to access language and configuration options. Requirements: to check your Mac model, select "About This Mac" from the Apple menu in your menu bar. OS: - macOS 10.14.2 Mojave (or higher) recommended - macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra supported Supported hardware: - MacBook Pro: all since late 2016 - MacBook Air: all since mid 2017 - iMac: all since late 2014 with Radeon graphics, and all iMacs since mid 2017 - Mac Pro: all since 2019 - Mac mini: all since 2018 - eGPU: all official eGPU modules based on AMD GPUs HDR requirements: - macOS 10.14.2 or higher - Any iMac capable of 500Nits display that supports Automatic Brightness Adjustment.
